serialized.body:
To,

**Abdul Ali**

**Address Line 1,**\
**Address Line 2,**\
**City, State, PIN**

**Subject: Relieving Letter**

Dear **Abdul Ali**,

This is in furtherance to your resignation letter dated **15th March, 2018** wherein you had requested to be relieved from your services on **15th April, 2018**. 

We wish you inform you that your resignation has been accepted and you are being relieved from your position of **Senior Associate** with **Functionary Labs Pvt** with effect from **15th April 2018**.

Your full and final settlement would be processed and credited in the next **45 day**s to the account provided during your employment. 

We appreciate your contributions to **Functionary Labs Pvt** and wish you all the best for your future endeavours.

 

Regards,

**HR Manager**
serialized.Name: Abdul Ali

content.raw:
To,

**Abdul Ali**

**Address Line 1,**\
**Address Line 2,**\
**City, State, PIN**

**Subject: Relieving Letter**

Dear **Abdul Ali**,

This is in furtherance to your resignation letter dated **15th March, 2018** wherein you had requested to be relieved from your services on **15th April, 2018**. 

We wish you inform you that your resignation has been accepted and you are being relieved from your position of **Senior Associate** with **Functionary Labs Pvt** with effect from **15th April 2018**.

Your full and final settlement would be processed and credited in the next **45 day**s to the account provided during your employment. 

We appreciate your contributions to **Functionary Labs Pvt** and wish you all the best for your future endeavours.

 

Regards,

**HR Manager**
